dict.acceptation: 限制，限定；拘束，束缚；管制；

sent.orig: There is no restriction on theme or content; No restriction on drawing technique or painting type.
sent.trans: 参赛作品题材和内容不限；画法和画种不限。

sent.orig: Restriction versus opposition to restriction is the main form of class struggle in the new-democratic state.
sent.trans: 限制和反限制，是新民主主义国家内部阶级斗争的主要形式。

sent.orig: Close all Software Restriction Policy property pages before deleting the Software Restriction Policies.
sent.trans: 删除软件限制策略前，请关闭所有软件限制策略属性页。

sent.orig: This is what happened in the British rubber-restriction and the American cotton-restriction programs.
sent.trans: 在英国的橡胶生产限制方案和美国的棉花生产限制方案中，都发生过上述这种事情。

sent.orig: She wanted no restriction -- not anything material, not any form of mental restriction either.
sent.trans: 她想没有任何束缚——无论是身体上的，还是精神上的。
